Commands.Power of the Crystal: 2-HIT BRV+HP attack.  First hit lowers target's BRV by 1/4.  Consumes 50% of current HP if Chelinka's Prayer isn't active.
Commands.BRV Attack+: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Consumes 10% of current HP if Chelinka's Prayer isn't active.
Commands.Rela Crystal: 1-HIT BRV attack.  Grants Max BRV Up and Chelinka's Prayer.  Chelinka's Prayer grants BRV Regen and HP Regen.  Consumes all BRV if Chelinka's Prayer isn't active.

Passives.Power of the Crystal Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Power of the Crystal.
Passives.Critical Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with critical hits.
Passives.BRV Guard Up: Slightly raises Defense when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Rela Crystal Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Rela Crystal.
Passives.Break Bonus Up: Slightly raises Break Bonus earned after breaking an enemy.
Passives.Power of the Crystal Charge: Increases the max uses of Power of the Crystal by 1.
Passives.Buff Boost: Slightly raises Max BRV while buffed.
Passives.Rela Crystal Charge: Increases the max uses of Rela Crystal by 1.
Passives.The Twins' Bond: Slightly raises Initial BRV, Max BRV, Attack and Defense when Chelinka's Prayer is active.
Passives.Chelinka's Prayer Speed Up: Moderately raises Speed while Chelinka's Prayer is active.
Passives.Power of the Crystal Extend: Moderately raises the BRV damage dealt with the second hit of Power of the Crystal.Turns it to a 2-HIT AoE BRV+HP attack.HP damage is divided equally amongst all targets.BRV stolen from the target can overflow up to 150% of Max BRV.
Passives.Chelinka's Prayer Attack Up: Moderately raises Attack while Chelinka's Prayer is active.
Passives.Rela Crystal Extend: Increases Rela Crystal's number of hits to 2.Moderately raises its total potency.Extends buffs granted by Rela Crystal by 2 turns.Triggers an HP attack if BRV is above 80% Max BRV.

Weapons.Gladius CP: 15: Increases Power of the Crystal's potency.Makes its first hit lower target's BRV by 1/2 (instead of 1/4).
Weapons.Brave Sword CP: 35: Increases the potency of Rela Crystal, BRV Attack and BRV Attack+.Increases Rela Crystal's max uses by 1.Increases the potency and extends the duration of Max BRV Up and Chelinka's Prayer.
